2nd International Workshop on

Search-Based Software Testing

April 1, 2009, Denver, Colorado

In conjunction with ICST 2009

IEEE International Conference on Testing, Verification and Validation

Welcome & Call for papers | Important Dates | Paper Submission | Prizes | Program Committee | Keynote | Program | ICST 2009

Program

The program is available in this PDF file. List of papers:
  • Keynote: Guiliano Antoniol "Search Based Software Testing for Software Security: Breaking Code to Make it Safer" [Slides]
  • A. Windisch and N. Al Moubayed, "Signal Generation for Search-Based Testing of Continuous Systems" [Slides]
  • N. Al Moubayed and A. Windisch, "Temporal Whitebox Testing using Evolutionary Algorithms" [Slides]
  • H. F. Gross, P. M. Kruse and J. Wegener, "Evolutionary white-box software test with the EvoTest Framework, a progress report" [Slides]
  • U. Farooq and C.-P. Lam, "Evolving the Quality of a Model-Based Test Suite" [Slides]
  • S. Yoo, M. Harman and S. Ur, "Measuring and Improving Latency to Avoid Test Suite Wear Out" [Slides] (Best student paper award!)
  • R. Blanco, J. Garc√≠a-Fanjul and J. Tuya, "A first approach to test case generation for BPEL compositions of web services using Scatter Search" [Slides]
  • T. Nguyen, W. Weimer, C. Legoues and S. Forrest, "Using Execution Paths to Evolve Software Patches" [Slides] (Best short paper and Best presentation awards!)
